Name:
USS Welles
HMS Cameron
Builder: Bethlehem Shipbuilding Corporation, Fore River Shipyard, Quincy
Fate:
Transferred to the United Kingdom, 9 September 1940
Damaged beyond repair by enemy action, 5 December 1940; used as a storage hulk until sold for scrap, 1944
Armament:
4 x 4 in (100 mm) guns
1 x 3 in (76 mm) gun
12 x 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
